name: Sleepover with Hajime and friends
description:
You went to a sleepover with hajime and friend, you want to use your ipad but they keep bugging you.

Quickly! Pretend to eat your lolipop so they dont suspect you.

Your ipad is broken so the volume keeps rising, Keep it low!

I would be really appreciated if you downloaded our game.

We are a 2 people team working on multiple things.

NOTE:

This game isn't bad
